channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Temu’s billionaire founder lost his title as China’s richest person just 20 days after winning it
item.description: Colin Huang’s net worth tanked $14.1 billion after disappointing earnings results.

item.title: Trump Media stock falls below $20 per share, a first since company went public
item.description: Trump Media, the company majority-owned by ex-President Donald Trump, fell below $20 per share for the first time since it started publicly trading as...

item.title: Why AI’s bears won’t see their dreams come true in Nvidia’s earnings report
American kids are losing fundamental skills—states should address this now before they lose billions in federal funding
item.description: Officials have the opportunity to use ESSER funding creatively to support students and families—but only if the states act before the Sept. 30 deadlin...

item.title: The importance of Nvidia earnings to the market is rivaling that of large economic reports
item.description: Nvidia's long-awaited earnings could test a market that has yet to fully recover from this month's pullback.

item.title: The uranium market may be headed into a perfect storm — and a sharp price run-up
Consumer Reports ranks the most reliable used cars for the first time
item.description: General Motors shines, but Lexus is on top.

item.title: Nvidia reports earnings after the bell
item.description: Nvidia reports second fiscal-quarter earnings Wednesday after the bell.

item.title: There are now more 401(k) millionaires than ever before, Fidelity reports
Total number of 401(k) millionaires hits a record high
item.description: Fidelity says nearly a half million of the accounts top the benchmark.

item.title: OpenSea receives Wells notice from SEC, regulator says NFTs are securities
item.description: Crypto marketplace OpenSea has been added to the SEC's list of targets, as the regulator extends its crackdown on the sector.

item.title: Live coverage: Market on edge as Nvidia prepares to reveal earnings
item.description: All eyes will be on AI chipmaker Nvidia and CEO Jensen Huang on Wednesday, as the company delivers its highly anticipated Q2 earnings report.

item.title: Super Micro shares fall 23% on filing delay, Hindenburg Research report
item.description: Shares of Super Micro fell after the company announced it will not file its annual report for the fiscal year on time.

item.title: Lowe’s becomes latest company to back away from its diversity initiative
